name: Pulusu
description:
How many of you remember playing hand slap with your friends in your childhood. You miss those silly days ,right. Well, not anymore. 

Pulusu is a arcade game.  Experience  the hand slap game of your childhood in your mobile.

Goal of the game : Simple, do let opponent touch your hand.

Rules of the game : Don't move before enemy.

Why are you still reading this instead of playing game. Download and Experience the CRAZY FUN old days in your smartphone, anywhere,  anytime.

NOTE: This is an Beta build.  Please  post suggestions and bugs in the discussion board.
